amendment.description: To provide for eligibility for retired pay for non-regular service.

action.text: Amendment SA 2473 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Durbin to amendment SA 2433.
Amendment SA 2473 was modified to reflect a first degree amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 2473 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Durbin.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2473 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 315.
